alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 05 at 8:55AM AKDT until August 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... * AFFECTED AREA...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * TIMING...From Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * WINDS...Southeast 5 to 10 mph. Gusts to 15 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs 80 to 90. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that weather conditions could lead to the potential for a Red Flag event in the near future. This watch will remain in effect until it is upgraded to a Red Flag Warning or that it is determined that the Red Flag event will not develop. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
